items.sentence: Tom put a piece of dry ice into a cup of water.
Tom has no desire to learn how to speak French.
Tom has two brothers. They both live in Boston.
Tom hid the gun under some socks in the drawer.
You should always wash your hands before meals.
I can\'t find anything wrong with what Tom did.
I can\'t forget what you said to me last night.
You should plan to leave between 6:00 and 7:00.
Mary isn\'t really sick. She\'s just faking it.
There wasn\'t a single mistake in Tom\'s essay.
